body_html:
@soumith Yes i did install the correct version for magma-cuda.

@apaszke Not sure if this is the relevant info, but the only lines in pytorch/torch/lib/build/THC/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log referring to magma are:

Determining if the prototype magma_get_sgeqrf_nb exists for MAGMA_V2 passed with the following output:

Run Build Command:"/usr/bin/make" "cmTC_2e3cf/fast"

@soumith Yes i did install the correct version for `magma-cuda`.

@apaszke Not sure if this is the relevant info, but the only lines in `pytorch/torch/lib/build/THC/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log` referring to magma are:

    Feature record: CXX_FEATURE:0cxx_variadic_macros
    Feature record: CXX_FEATURE:0cxx_variadic_templates
